newsUpdates.title: El Nido’s Pangulasian Island bags Conde Nast Middle East’s Gold List Award for 2020
newsUpdates.content: An El Nido private island recently won the international travel and lifestyle magazine Conde Nast Traveler Middle East’s Gold List Award for 2020, an award recognizing environmental-friendly hotels around the world.

newsUpdates.title: El Nido Palawan Travel Guide: Hotels, Itinerary & Local Tips
newsUpdates.content: Do you want to live the royal life in El Nido and stay in the best island resorts? Check out these highly-rated accommodations. You’ll have the exclusivity and serene vibe of a private island without the crowds and get the best service.

newsUpdates.title: Which Island in the Philippines is Right For You?
newsUpdates.content: At Lagen Island Resort, a 45-minute boat transfer from El Nido Airport, manager Jen Zafra knows that spectacular natural settings can enhance life’s most romantic experiences.
